info.title: FSM + HATEOAS Rails API
info.description: API demonstrating Finite State Machines with HATEOAS hypermedia controls for simplified UI development. This API provides self-descriptive resources where available actions are determined by the current state and user permissions.

get.description: Returns a collection of published articles with hypermedia controls (HATEOAS). Each article includes its current FSM state and available state transitions based on user permissions.

post.description: Creates a new article in "draft" state via event sourcing. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns all articles created by the authenticated user, regardless of state.
Returns all articles in "review" or "draft" state. Requires admin role.
Returns archived articles. Admins see all archived articles, regular users see only their own.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific article (HAL-style with embedded comments)
get.description: Returns a single article with HAL-style _embedded comments. Demonstrates hypermedia format with nested resources following HAL conventions.
